additions.p: Some notes and comments in the margins. Part I: A folio-sized bifolio is added in between fols. 67 and 68. It contains three pages worth of notes on Finnboga saga ramma in a different hand (in Icelandic). In the colophon is the following: Þetta er samantekid af próf: s.ra Torfa Jónssyni á Breidabilstad í Augusto 1824, en hripad aeptir hans egin handar udkaste af St. Jónssyni Part II: On fol. 8v, there is a note in the margin reading: No. 6. een Rigsdaler. 1799 and a large coat of arms with a crown. Around fols. 29-30, there is a new bifolio added reading Parcivals Saga NKS 1685 b 4to II. The leaves are numbered 28bis and 30bis. A little white slip (ca. 5x11cm) is inserted between fols. 125 and 126. Around item 48, there is a new bifolio reading Excerpta ur Sögur NKS 1685 b 4to. The leaves are numbered 257bis and 260bis.

filiation.ref: Based on T. Olavius's copy of AM 551 4to.
